activities:
JCAP Holdings, LLC  through its subsidiaries (collectively referred to as “Jefferson Capital”) provides financial services including traditional and unique recovery services for consumer charged-off accounts.

Jefferson Capital collects personal information from prospective customers, prospective employees, prospective vendors and other persons located in the European Union who may be interested in a business relationship with Jefferson Capital via website visits, phone calls, chats, emails, web forms, written correspondence, third party providers or other means.

Jefferson Capital uses this information to contact those persons about Jefferson Capital services, employment opportunities, potential business transactions and to generally improve the way Jefferson Capital markets its services.
